TopicTitle: Landing the first sober cosmonaught on the moon.

Articles.Content: Hey guys, have any of you attempted this difficult/impossible challenge?

I don't get it. o_O

You mean a real cosmonaut? Since as far as I know none of us are executives in the Russian Space Agency, that is indeed impossible, not to mention not a real KSP challenge.

I'm assuming the key word is "sober".

*downloads KSP alcoholic beverages mod*
I'm going to write it off as another noob who didn't understand and/or read the rules.
^ I can land one of those on the Mun! xD

I'm going to write it off as another noob who didn't understand and/or read the rules.

That's probably the case, considering he only has two posts.

@ OP, we currently lack the capacity to land humans on the Moon, and the Russian Space Agency isn't even trying.

This definitely does not fall under the Challenge rules, so I'm going to close this.

No worries Kosmo_Naught, we were all new here once. Feel free to check out the stickies and post a new challenge. Although you may want to shy away from reference to drugs and alcohol.

Challenge Guide: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24898-Challenge-Submission-Guide

Community Rules: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/30064-Community-Rules-July-24-2014

Welcome to the forums.

~Claw
